en: The Virgin suckling the Infant Christ, about 1565-75 (NG 270)

Volume 36 of the National Gallery Technical Bulletin focuses on Titian’s technique from after 1540 to his death in 1576. The results of technical examination of eight canvases in the National Gallery (two owned jointly with the National Galleries of Scotland) are assembled in the catalogue entries.
Manifest Author
Scientific Department (NG)

description: Volume 36 of the National Gallery Technical Bulletin focuses on Titian’s technique from after 1540 to his death in 1576. The results of technical examination of eight canvases in the National Gallery (two owned jointly with the National Galleries of Scotland) are assembled in the catalogue entries.
